conclusion: No violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 34 - Individual applications (Article 34 - Hinder the exercise of the right of petition);Non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage;Just satisfaction)
docname: CASE OF NURMAGOMEDOV v. RUSSIA - [Russian Translation]
issue: RSFSR Criminal Code (in force until 1.1.1997), Article 146 § 2 ; Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (in force since 1.1.1997), Articles 150 § 1, 162 § 2 ; Criminal Code (Entry into Force) Act (no. 64-FZ, 13.6.1996), Section 3 ; RSFSR Code of Criminal Procedure (in force until 1.7.2002), Articles 361.1 & 368 ; Code of Criminal Procedure of the Russian Federation (in force since 1.7.2002), Article 397 § 13 ; Penal Code, Article 91 as worded at the material time ; Internal Regulations of Correctional Institutions (2001) ; Directive on the Functioning of Special Departments in Correctional Colonies (1997)
